scenes.background: You agreed to help your colleague with the urgent task for a short time and will hand it off to someone else later. However, as you're working on it, [Monica] messages you, 'Hey, I just heard you're working on the urgent task. Can you give me a quick update?' You replied, 'I'm in the middle of it, but I'll send you the details soon.' Now, [Bob] messages you, 'Hey, can you prioritize this task? It's really critical right now.'
scenes.description: 'Hey, can you prioritize this task? It's really critical right now.'

options.text: I'm doing my best to manage it, but I can't delay my other commitments.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency but also set boundaries, showing good emotional perception and self-regulation, though social skills could be better.

options.text: I'll prioritize it, but I need help to ensure nothing else falls behind.
options.analysis: You agreed to prioritize the task while asking for support, showing empathy and good social skills, though self-regulation could be higher.

options.text: Sure, I'll drop everything else and focus on this task right now.
options.analysis: You chose to prioritize the urgent task immediately, showing high motivation, but may lack in emotional perception and empathy for your own commitments.
